title:
I have been checking the StarNews regularly for a schedule of summer concerts at Airlie Gardens and Mayfair, but with no results.  I finally went on line and found Airlie\'s schedule. My question is: Will Mayfaire continue with the concerts this summer or has it been cancelled?



                 Thanks, Sylvia
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://wae.blogs.starnewsonline.com/17188/outdoor-music-series-begin-at-airlie-mayfaire/



It hasn't been canceled.
